title: Fontlab and python
content:
does anyone know how to get python talking to fontlab on the mac?   
   
I'm running mac os 10.3.3, fontlab 4.6, and macpython 2.3. I can't seem to get the "macro" option to show up via "view/toolbars/"   
   
I've been trying to get python to work with fontlab since version 4.5 came out, and have just given up each time.   
   
anyone else go through this?
author: Tyler Young

comments.content:
Don't the suggestions listed at [http://www.fontlab.com/html/python.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050902073822/http:/www.fontlab.com/html/python.html) work for you?
